abilities.name: Driven by Fury
abilities.rule: In your opponent‚Äôs Shooting phase, each time an enemy unit has shot, if this model was hit by one or more of those attacks, it can make a Driven by Fury move. To do so, roll one D6 and add 2 to the roll: this model moves a number of inches up to the result, but must finish as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding **AIRCRAFT**). When doing so, this model can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. A model cannot make a Driven by Fury move while it is Battle‚Äêshocked or within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, and can only make one Driven by Fury move per phase.

abilities.name: Black Rage
abilities.rule: Each time this model makes a melee attack, you can re‚Äêroll the Hit roll. While this model‚Äôs unit is not within 6" of one or more friendly **BLOOD ANGELS CHARACTER** models, or 12" of one or more friendly **CHAPLAIN** models, it cannot be selected to Fall Back and its Objective Control characteristic is 0.
